broke.name: shopkeeper
broke.text: You don't have e-nya-ough coins for that!

line_1.text: The lake rumoured to be where the Legendary Fish inhabits...

line_2.name: Jonah
line_2.text: (My name is Jonah. I come from a long line of fishers who spent their days catching and selling fish.)

line_3.name: Jonah
line_3.text: (Naturally, I followed this path as well. Since I was young, I was able to catch fish in my hometown easily, no matter what I faced.)

line_4.name: Jonah
line_4.text: (I soon became bored. I wanted to experience the thrill of catching fish like I did in the beginning.)

line_5.name: Jonah
line_5.text: (Seeking something more, I left my home to travel to farther waters. While I did experience some excitement and challenge, I still felt something was missing...)

line_6.name: Jonah
line_6.text: (That's when I heard of a rumour of a "Legendary Fish" being whispered around. It caught my interest and so I decided my next goal was to find more about this fish. Maybe if I could catch such a legend, I could prove to myself and the world that I'm the best fisher of all. It would be the ultimate challenge!)

line_7.name: Jonah
line_7.text: (No one knows what it truly looks like. But there've been claims over the years of a large fish, hidden away in secluded waters.)

line_8.name: Jonah
line_8.text: (They say it was a like a massive shadow lurking beneath the depths, yet it would disappear the moment people could merely see a glimpse. Or anyone seeking it out would never return to be able to say more...)

line_10.name: Jonah
line_10.text: After all this time...I can finally see for myself if these legends are true...and achieve the title of strongest fisher of all!

line_11.name: Jonah
line_11.text: I'll have to be careful. No one comes here because of the other rumours that more dangerous creatures reside in this lake too. Let's test the waters first and catch what I can for now.

line_0.name: Jonah
line_0.text: Hmm...there's a strange glowing light coming from underwater here.

line_1.name: Jonah
line_1.text: It doesn't seem to be dangerous. Rather, I feel like it's giving me some kind of power.

line_2.name: Jonah
line_2.text: I think if I fish around these spots, something good might happen.

popup.text: Glowing spots will sometimes appear around the lake. While fishing in these spots, your chance to catch rare fish may increase!

line_2.name: Jonah
line_2.text: Who are you? Why were you caught on my fishing line?

line_3.name: Nix
line_3.text: I'm just someone who enjoys high quality seafood, let's say. You can call me Nix. I happened to see something tasty and I couldn't help but reach for it.

line_4.name: Nix
line_4.text: It turns out I was chasing after prey already claimed. My apologies.

line_5.name: Nix
line_5.text: Still, it seems you're quite skilled to be able to lure and catch fish that can catch even my eye. Perhaps we could help each other out?

line_6.name: Jonah
line_6.text: ...I don't need any help. I'll be able to catch the legendary fish on my own.

line_7.name: Nix
line_7.text: Fuhuhu~ No need to be shy. The legendary fish, hm? Truly, a delic- *ahem*, a delightful goal. My, the more I learn about you, the more I want to join!

line_8.name: Nix
line_8.text: You may be strong now, but there's more to see in the waters than this mere lake. Rest assured, I can guide you through dangers you wouldn't be able to face alone. And it would be much faster to reach this legendary fish if we combined our strength against any obstables, no?

line_9.name: Jonah
line_9.text: (She does have a point...especially facing certain types of fish I've encountered in this lake).

line_10.name: Jonah
line_10.text: You said there's more to see than this lake. Do you know more about the legend then?

line_11.name: Nix
line_11.text: You have a sharp ear. I can tell you that the legendary fish doesn't reside in this lake, but I know a way to its true habitat. When the time is right, I'll lead you to it.

line_12.name: Jonah
line_12.text: ...Fine then. I don't really have any other leads. But I expect you to pull your weight.

line_13.name: Nix
line_13.text: Of course. Just repay me with some of your catches now and then. I can already taste the sweet flesh of seafood...

line_1.name: Strange Boy
line_1.text: Woahh!! What ho! It appears another inhabitant yet finds this lake!

line_2.name: Lance
line_2.text: Fear not, for I, Lance, shall protect you from these dangerous waters!

line_4.name: Jonah
line_4.text: I wouldn't normally consider it, but this place does give me the creeps...

line_5.name: Jonah
line_5.text: What's in it for you though? Why are you even here?

line_6.name: Lance
line_6.text: I'm afraid that I am quite lost! I, too, wandered about only to find myself in this yet unescapable place despite my best efforts to leave.

line_8.name: Lance
line_8.text: Do not worry! Regardless of my own hardships, it wouldn't be right to leave a hapless person in danger.

line_9.name: Jonah
line_9.text: Ugh...I didn't come here by accident like you did, apparently.

line_10.name: Jonah
line_10.text: But I'm starting to get the feeling I'm going to need all the help I can get here. Have you heard of the legendary fish?

line_11.name: Jonah
line_11.text: That's my goal here. I'm going to catch it. If you help me, then I'll help you find a way out of here. I mean, I don't wanna stay here forever either...

line_12.name: Lance
line_12.text: The legendary fish! To attempt to catch such a myth...you have a burning soul of passion, just like me! I would be honoured to join you in your quest!

line_13.name: Lance
line_13.text: And not only that, you would reach your hand out to help me too...truly I have found a kindred spirit...

line_14.name: Jonah
line_14.text: Uh, yeah...let's go with that. Welcome to the team, I guess...

line_15.name: Lance
line_15.text: I'll give it my all to aid you!

line_0.name: Nix
line_0.text: Hello there. Are the fish biting today? I hope we'll be able to catch a lot.

line_1.name: Nix
line_1.text: After all, if we catch a lot, you can sell them to get stronger, right? The stronger you'll get, the more fish you can catch.

line_2.name: Nix
line_2.text: And the stronger the fish, the more delicious they will be...

line_3.name: Nix
line_3.text: Fuhuhu...I can't wait to try some.

line_5.name: Nix
line_5.text: Of course. There's nothing like the pursuit of fine cuisine.

line_6.name: Jonah
line_6.text: (Is she really going to be a reliable fishing partner..?)

line_0.name: Jonah
line_0.text: I've been meaning to ask you. What exactly are you doing when I'm reeling in one those shadows in the lake? It does make fishing them up easier, but something feels off whenever you do something.

line_1.name: Nix
line_1.text: Hm? Why it's my dark magic, of course.

line_3.name: Nix
line_3.text: Huhu, no need to look so shocked. Haven't you seen many unexplainable things in this lake already?

line_4.name: Nix
line_4.text: My magic has been taught and inherited in my family for generations. Truth be told, I went out of my way to learn more than I bargained for, even in terms of dark magic.

line_6.name: Nix
line_6.text: Would you really like to know?

line_8.name: Jonah
line_8.text: But why did you push yourself like that?

line_9.name: Nix
line_9.text: Surely you would understand, considering your own quest to catch the legendary fish.

line_10.name: Jonah
line_10.text: I see. So you wanted to be stronger, too.

line_11.name: Nix
line_11.text: Ahh, but it was all for naught. I did get strong, but alas...

line_13.name: Nix
line_13.text: Even though I wished for the might to catch all the seafood in the world, it turns out such forbidden art renders the flesh tasteless and dull when it causes my prey's last breath.

line_14.name: Nix
line_14.text: It really is such a shame...

line_16.name: Nix
line_16.text: So I'm truly grateful I met you. Fate has brought us a wonderful partnership where you can catch all the fish you please, and I can eat my fill~.

line_0.name: Lance
line_0.text: Lo, my friend! Another great day out on the water, isn't it?

line_1.name: Lance
line_1.text: If any of these fish creatures are bothering you, just let me know! I'll knock 'em back and protect you, no problem!

line_3.name: Jonah
line_3.text: I appreciate the help, but you're a little too loud...

line_4.name: Jonah
line_4.text: Anyways, you said you ended up here because you got lost, right? How exactly did that happen...?

line_5.name: Lance
line_5.text: To be quite honest, I'm not exactly sure!

line_7.name: Lance
line_7.text: I'm afraid this has always been a problem for me, much to the chagrin of my friends and family. I can't help the call of adventure!

line_8.name: Lance
line_8.text: That siren song of excitement tends to make me lose sight of everything else, unfortunately...

line_9.name: Jonah
line_9.text: I suppose I can understand that, sort of. It's hard to pay attention to other things when you want to focus on what you really want.

line_10.name: Jonah
line_10.text: I just don't know about wandering into a cursed place like this without realizing it.

line_11.name: Lance
line_11.text: Haha! We really are more alike than I thought!

line_12.name: Jonah
line_12.text: No, that's not what I...ah, nevermind.

line_0.name: Jonah
line_0.text: What's this menacing aura I feel suddenly?

line_1.name: Nix
line_1.text: ...It seems it's time. The lord of the lake has appeared.

line_3.name: Nix
line_3.text: That's right. I believe it has recognized your strength and has shown itself before you.

line_4.name: Nix
line_4.text: The path to the legendary fish that I mentioned to you is through the lord. If you can defeat it, you'll be able to access the true gome of the legend.

line_6.name: Nix
line_6.text: Fuhuhu, do you feel ready? I believe with our combined power, we certainly have a strong chance against it. But there's no rush. It'll be waiting for whenever you wish to challenge it.

line_7.name: Jonah
line_7.text: Hmph. If I can't catch this "lord", then there's no way I can catch the legendary fish. I'm not going to let it get in my way.

popup.text: The lord of the lake awaits! Find and approach it when you're ready to challenge it!

line_2.name: Jonah
line_2.text: I...thanks. I don't know if I could've done that on my own

line_4.name: Nix
line_4.text: See, I knew we would make a good team. You're welcome~.

line_5.name: Nix
line_5.text: Now that we've defeated the lord, you'll be able to travel to the legend's lake. And I...

line_6.name: Nix
line_6.text: I can have a treat to a truly rare delicacy indeed...

line_7.name: Jonah
line_7.text: Err...is it really okay to eat...the lord?

line_8.name: Nix
line_8.text: Don't worry. The lord is eternally tied to its lake, even if its vessel is temporarily missing.

line_9.name: Nix
line_9.text: We should reward ourselves after such a struggle, no? It wouldn't do to enter new territory on an empty stomach.

popup.text: Congratulations! You can now teleport to the next lake by pressing "T". Safe travels!

line_1.name: Jonah
line_1.text: Or more like it looks completely cursed...

line_2.name: Nix
line_2.text: A fish wouldn't be called legendary if it were to reside somewhere normal after all.

line_3.name: Jonah
line_3.text: Hey, you okay? You look a little pale.

line_4.name: Nix
line_4.text: ...Truthfully, I've been to this place before. I don't have fond memories of it.

line_5.name: Nix
line_5.text: The potential to catch the legend, as you say, is too promising to pass up, however.

line_6.name: Nix
line_6.text: Don't worry about me. Let's raise our strengths here and find our ultimate goal.

line_7.name: Jonah
line_7.text: Alright, if you're sure. Time to fish, then.
